title: Create Motion-Aware Animated Widget
description: Build a notification card that respects reduced motion preferences.
instructions: Create a NotificationCard widget that slides in from the right when shown. When the user has reduced motion enabled, it should fade in instantly instead of sliding. The card should include: (1) Check for reduced motion preference using MediaQuery, (2) Animate with slide + fade when motion is allowed, (3) Show instantly or with simple fade when reduced motion is preferred, (4) Include a dismiss button with proper semantics.

hints.text: Use MediaQuery.disableAnimationsOf(context) to check for reduced motion preference
Set _controller.value directly instead of animating when reduced motion is preferred
Use SlideTransition and FadeTransition for the full animation, but only FadeTransition for reduced motion

commonMistakes.mistake: Always animating regardless of motion preferences
commonMistakes.consequence: Users with vestibular disorders may experience discomfort or nausea
commonMistakes.correction: Check MediaQuery.disableAnimationsOf and provide instant or fade-only alternatives

commonMistakes.mistake: Not announcing notifications to screen readers
commonMistakes.consequence: Screen reader users miss important notifications
commonMistakes.correction: Use SemanticsService.announce to alert screen reader users when notifications appear
